name: Thumbper
description:
Thumbper is a game for people who want to rave in solitude. The game was created for the inaugural NAGJam in which it placed first.

Requirements :

  • Thumbs. 2 or more is recommended.
  • A xbox 360 controller.
  • A windows PC.

This is a free release by Kobus vd walt with music by Jukio Kalio aka Kozilek. You can get the schweeeeet music over here : https://kozilek.bandcamp.com/
